author: bencos18 (492089091320446976)
install_msg: Amazon Affiliate Link Cog installed! Use [p]amazon for commands. Set your affiliate tag with [p]amazon set_tag <tag>. See [p]help amazon for more.
short: Amazon affiliate link handler for Discord.
description: Automatically converts Amazon links to affiliate links using a configurable tag per server.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores configuration data per guild, specifically affiliate tags and enable/disable state for affiliate link handling.
